channel.title: Commands In Cheat Client

item.title: Commands In Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:8, topic:461850”][quote author=zeropointx link=topic=564795.msg4119440#msg4119440 date=1349521554]

Why not?

I think only way that cart works is becouse there is that cart track transportation thing in rs. I guess you transform into that and thats why players can be turned into carts.

What the hell are you talking about?

OT: Wouldn’t this only appear client sided? Anyways, try looking the updateAppearance method, to see what the params do.

What you mean? If you don’t know its possible to turn into cart in most RSPS:sses. As far as I know it isn’t possible to turn into any other “objects” becouse only cart was coded into character values…
[/quote]
no. You can pretty much transform into anything, nothing was “coded” into the character values. Iirc, its a field in the player updating that sets your model.[/quote]
I just wonder why

  1. I haven’t seen anyone turning into any other objects with cheat clients ever.
  2. I have tried and I have been unable to turn into ANYTHING other than human/cart?

Read full topic

item.title: Commands In Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“zeropointx, post:7, topic:461850”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=564795.msg4119109#msg4119109 date=1349473024]

Why not?

I think only way that cart works is becouse there is that cart track transportation thing in rs. I guess you transform into that and thats why players can be turned into carts.

What the hell are you talking about?

OT: Wouldn’t this only appear client sided? Anyways, try looking the updateAppearance method, to see what the params do.
[/quote]
What you mean? If you don’t know its possible to turn into cart in most RSPS:sses. As far as I know it isn’t possible to turn into any other “objects” becouse only cart was coded into character values…[/quote]
no. You can pretty much transform into anything, nothing was “coded” into the character values. Iirc, its a field in the player updating that sets your model.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands In Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

I don’t think you can ever turn into other objects. Changing character look values is only way to change how you appear (without admin permissions). As far as I know cart is only “object” there is that you can transform into. You can’t just choose any object you want to transform into…

Read full topic

item.title: Commands In Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

From the looks of it those are the ints to create a cart. You’ll need the ints of the item you want to turn into. I’d recommend creating a createYOURITEM() method.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands In Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

Hello everyone,
I can currently turn into a cart in servers.

But I want to change the type of object I turn into, this is the command, do the 82 represent the code of the cart?

private static void makeCart() { int[] arrayOfInt = new int[]{82, 82, 82, 82, 82, 82, 82}; int[] localObject = new int[]{82, 82, 82, 82, 82}; updateAppearance(arrayOfInt, localObject); }

thanks.

Read full topic
